title: Don Quixote
summary: Don Quixote (/ˌdɒn kiːˈhoʊti/, US: /-teɪ/;[1] Spanish: [doŋ kiˈxote] (listen), Early Modern Spanish: [doŋ kiˈʃote]) is a Spanish novel by Miguel de Cervantes. Its full title is The Ingenious Gentleman Don Quixote of La Mancha (Modern Spanish: El ingenioso hidalgo (in Part 2, caballero) don Quijote de la Mancha, pronounced [el iŋxeˈnjoso iˈðalɣo ðoŋ kiˈxote ðe la ˈmantʃa] (listen))
